name: M&M'SMovieNight
0: ”Alexa, open M and M’S Movie Night”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: m. and m. s movie night
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Love watching Halloween movies with your family, but can't decide what to watch? Well, you're not alone. That's why Red and Yellow, two of your favorite M&M'S, have asked M&M'S fans for their favorite movies to watch during the spooky season. The results? M&M'S Movie Night, where you'll find these features: 

• The Creepy Critic: A family-friendly Halloween movie recommendation each time you visit, ten in all.

• The Perfect M&M'S: A recommended M&M'S pairing to munch while you watch, with the option to buy it right now to be delivered to your door.

• Opt-In for Texts: The chance to receive a text with a link to the movie on Prime Video.

• Haunted Hint: Before you leave the skill, you’ll get a hint about the next movie. Come back to find out if you were right!

What are you waiting for? Say, “Alexa, open M&M’S Movie Night” right now, and we'll get you everything you need for the perfect Halloween movie night.

Enabling contact permissions for this skill in the Alexa app allows users to easily share their phone number. This skill will ask for confirmation before sending texts. If you say ""yes"" or provide your phone number via voice, Mars Wrigley will only use it text a link to stream the recommended movie on Amazon Prime. To opt out of texting, reply STOP any time.

This skill uses Alexa Shopping to make purchases on Amazon. Alexa allows purchasing by voice using your default payment and shipping settings. You can set a voice confirmation code, turn off purchasing, and see product and order details in your Alexa app.
